T02D1780:274a-1: badzra mah'a k'a la aashta ka sto tra /
T02D1780:274a-3: rdo rje nag po chen po'i bstod pa brgyad pa /
T02D1780:274a-4: aom nag po chen po la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1780:274a-5: h'a h'a h'um mdzad ki li ki li sgrogs pa'i
T02D1780:274a-6: sgra yis 'byung po'i tshogs pa rnam par 'thag /
T02D1780:274a-7: h'um h'um sgrogs pa'i zhal rnams kyis ni mi yi
T02D1780:274a-8: sha za rgyu ma'i phreng ba 'khrug pa'i sku //
T02D1780:274a-9: phyag na kha tv'am ga dang mdung thung mi yi lag pa'i mtshan pa 'dzin cing mdzes pa'i gzugs //
T02D1780:274a-10: mi sdug gzugs can spyan dang dbu skra dmar ser
T02D1780:274b-0: dur @274b khrod la dgyes zhing skyong kun nas srungs
T02D1780:274b-1: // zhal dang zhal nas phem phem phat ces sgrogs
T02D1780:274b-2: pas so sor bskyed pa'i me dpung chen po yi
T02D1780:274b-3: // // phreng ba rab tu 'bar ba'i dbus na
T02D1780:274b-4: bzhugs shing sku la brgyan pas yan lag nye bar
T02D1780:274b-5: // // mdzes // gsod byed drag po'i phyag gis
T02D1780:274b-6: mi yi khrag 'dzag rgyun du btung zhing sbrul gyi
T02D1780:274b-7: // // mdzes // phreng bas brgyan // dmyal bar
T02D1780:274b-8: bsreg pa sel zhing sa steng zhing rnams skyong ba
T02D1780:274b-9: khyod ni rol zhing rol bar mdzod //
T02D1780:274b-10: dri med rdzogs pa'i byang chub brnyes kyang srid pa gsum po khengs par 'gengs nus 'o dod kyis //
T02D1780:274b-11: h'um h'um phat ces ma rungs dgra yis nyin bzhin 'jig rten phyugs rnams kyi ni bgegs 'joms shing //
T02D1780:274b-12: h'a h'a aanta dgod pa yis ni dus rnams kun du shin tu rab tu 'jigs par byed //
T02D1780:274b-13: mgo skyes ral pa sma ra shin tu dmar ser nye bar 'phro ba'i zhing skyong srung bar mdzod //
T02D1780:274b-14: sgeg cing rol pa'i 'jo sgeg dang ldan gsus pa 'phyang ba phyag na ral gri kham kham kham //
T02D1780:274b-15: rakta 'thungs ba'i spyan dang phyag ni khrag ltar dmar ba ram ram ti dang ru ru ru //
T02D1780:274b-16: ngo mtshar snang mdzad gtum po'i shugs can khro bo'i lta bas khro gnyer mdzod cig krum krum krum //
T02D1780:274b-17: 'khor bcas skyong ba'i zhing skyong ma lus bdud dang ro langs 'dul bar mdzad pa tam tam tam //
T02D1780:274b-18: nges par gnod pa'i bdud dang nyon mongs bag chags gcod byed gri gug 'dzin pa hrim hrim hrim //
T02D1780:274b-19: nag po'i mchu dang 'dra ba'i sku ni rtsod dang nyes 'phrog thod pa'i phreng can kam kam kam //
T02D1780:274b-20: rmad byung 'od kyis 'jig rten g-yo zhing snang bar mdzad pa gtum po'i shugs can tsam tsam tsam //
T02D1780:274b-21: lha mchog dam tshig ldan pa khyod kyis tshogs kyi mchog dang zhing rnams skyongs shig sam sam sam //
T02D1780:274b-22: 'gro ba sna tshogs dri med chu bzhin gzigs nas nges par gshin rje 'gog byed yam yam yam //
T02D1780:274b-23: rlung gi shugs bzhin myur du rgyu bas nyon mongs 'jig rten snang bar mdzad pa bam bam bam //
T02D1780:274b-24: smin ma gya gyu'i khro gnyer bsnyer bas 'jigs par mdzad kyang 'jigs las thar byed bhrum bhrum bhrum //
T02D1780:274b-25: sgrub po rnams la phan dang bde mdzad gnod pa'i sgo rnams bsrung ba'i zhing skyong ksham ksham ksham //
T02D1780:275a-0: bzod pa'i lus can kshim kshim kshim zhes gdug pa rnams kyis bzod @275a * //
T02D1780:275a-1: par dka' ba'i ca co sgrog / ka ha ka
T02D1780:275a-2: ha'i gsung gi rgyun dang char sprin sngon po'i lus
T02D1780:275a-3: can gcig bus thams cad gnon //
T02D1780:275a-4: hr'im kl'im shr'im gis sngags dang pa tsa pa tsa'i sngags rnams kyis ni lus can thal bar byed //
T02D1780:275a-5: sgrub po rnams la kun du gcod pa'i gegs rnams nye bar zhi bar mdzod cig zhing skyong che //
T02D1780:275a-6: klam klam klam zhes rtag tu nyon mongs gyur pa'i lus can srid gsum 'gro ba'i nyon mongs rnams //
T02D1780:275a-7: rnam par bsal nas phyag gi zhags pas skyong zhing srung ba la phan phyugs bdag pam pam pam //
T02D1780:275a-8: sngags kyi bdag nyid sngags kyi sku can sngags myos
T02D1780:275a-9: sngags kyis zhi ba'i bde ster 'bras bu'i phyag /
T02D1780:275a-10: mtha' dag rgyal ba'i sku bzhin mdzes pa zhing rnams
T02D1780:275a-11: skyong bar mdzad pa khyod kyis de rnams srungs //
T02D1780:275a-12: sgrub pa po'am slob dpon gang zhig dam tshig dge mchog mkhas pa'i blo can thun gsum du //
T02D1780:275a-13: sngags kyi bstod pa brgyad po klog byed de rnams bsod nams ldan zhing rgyal bar 'gyur ba dang //
T02D1780:275a-14: tshe dang dpal dang grags dang 'byor ldan mnyam med stobs kyis rnam par gnon pa'i gzi brjid rgyas //
T02D1780:275a-15: thams cad shes shing de yis nyin mtshan rtag tu bgegs kyi tshogs ni myos shing nyams par 'gyur //
T02D1780:275a-16: rdo rje nag po chen po'i bstod pa brgyad pa
